name: raycast-google-cloud-sql-tunnel
title: Google Cloud SQL Tunnel
description: Raycast menu bar command to start and stop a Google Cloud SQL IAP tunnel via gcloud.
author: Ryan Bright <ryan@moonriselabs.ai>

commands.name: tunnel
commands.title: Google Cloud SQL Tunnel
commands.subtitle: Google IAP
commands.description: Start or stop a Google Cloud SQL IAP tunnel.

preferences.name: bastionInstance
preferences.title: Bastion Instance
preferences.description: Compute Engine VM name for the IAP bastion.

preferences.name: bastionZone
preferences.title: Bastion Zone
preferences.description: GCP zone containing the bastion VM (e.g. us-central1-a).

preferences.name: localPort
preferences.title: Local Port
preferences.description: Local port to bind for the tunnel.

preferences.name: remotePort
preferences.title: Remote Port
preferences.description: Remote database port to forward to.

preferences.name: gcloudPath
preferences.title: gcloud Path (optional)
preferences.description: Optional absolute path to the gcloud binary.
